welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fishkill, a charming city known for its picturesque views and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Fishkill has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport houses ticketing, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Dutchess County Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stewart Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Orange County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Orange County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, rental car services, and gift shops.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Danbury Municipal Airport is reserved for private and corporate aircraft, offering a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
